review: one of my favorite games in my favorite genre
i love this game so fucking much
gud

the game definitely has a certain charm  while i dont particularly care of the art style the idea of playing in a living story book is pretty cool  watching the story have multiple generations and it feels like choices matter is pretty neat  the combat is okay  its nothing new or innovative but it gets the job done
very enjoyable rpg simulator with nice a nice battle system as well great with friends or alone
its good
highly addictive and enjoyable game i love watching my characters progress and grow my only lament is them getting old and retiring highly reccomend to anyone interested
fun stories and narration gameplay is a bit obscure at times but not too difficult
fantastic game from a fantastic team
good game

ive owned this in my backlog for a bit now and had tried starting a couple of times but hadnt finished a campaign ever yesterday i finally focused enough to get the job done and im so pleased that i did tremendous game decisions matter combat is fun and the graphics just work perfect for playing on the steam deck too

extremely enjoyable to me at least has a lot of unique features i really enjoy the art style the combat system and the legacy aspect of the characters it can be difficult at times but  most good things are
a good story a long journey there and back again and now years passed its your time to take the journey
nice game
this game fucks
wonderful game if you can read

phenomenal its mechanically sound and interesting the writing is goodtoexcellent and it actually delivers on the replayability that everyone is always after with random levels and procedural generation and ai if youre going to play multiplayer i strongly recommend taking turns reading the dialogue aloud or casting characters if you have enough people playing if it looks like something you imighti enjoy its a mustbuy
slow start but great once youre familiar with the game mechanics
amazing game theres nothing quite like it
yes
its very fun to play with others the stories you can create using the characters are near limitless
i am attached to so many characters
awesome story telling game with lots of replayability
fun game with a unique identity of its own nice blend of rpg and strategy

99 hours in and more to go this is a game i plan to go back to every few years to enjoy the brilliant story writing choosing new adventures and playing with different strategies i would write more but that would take time away from playing the game
the gift that keeps on giving
solid game that strikes itself somewhere between a fairytale a legend and a tabletop role playing game my only regret is that i could not give them more money to keep working on new dlc
gud game

a story driven tactical rpg obviously crafted with love and passion the years go by and your group of heroes age as they recruit new members and say goodbye to the veterans to retirement  the ones who survived their adventures this fantasy world brims with magic wonder and sometimes melancholy as time waits for no one and stories are either forgotten or transformed into legends i received the game for my birthday
fun
alot of versatility can add or download more stories or encounters
fun game
i like how play as a hero and their children simple turn based
i like the combat system the options and choices you make can impact things i can see this being good in replay value also
gng shi
youd have to pry this game from my cold dead unfeeling hands
this game makes me excited to have friends to play with endless laughter and room for adventure

a great little turnbased game with interesting storylines and a clever premise as a ttrpg player whose group never gets to meet much these days wildermyth helps scratch that urge for gridbased combat and an unfolding story
an excellent rpg that brings in the best elements from tabletop roleplaying and creates a unique and fun turnbased videogame

undeniably charming and extremely replayable turnbased combat fantasy game ive played every campaign sometimes twice and i imagine ill be returning to this game regularly over the years as a favoured way to relax
when the credits rolled i felt like my favorite tv show had ended combat is good too i was absolutely immersed the whole time incredible game

this is one of those hidden gem games every story you play is different you get to create and live your characters lives the art is absolutely precious everything about it is masterful if you love dnd andor fantasy stories you will love this 12 out of 10
amazing tbh love this game
immersive
so much fun i cant stop
this game is so fucking good

this is a phenomenal game  the writing art and gameplay are all so very unique  its a ton of fun to play with my partner  theres not a lot of rustic fantasy out there and the tactical gameplay is crunchy and creative  the procedurally generated world feels organic and the storylines are immersive
it saved my pretend marriage with the neighbor
good
solid game quaint 2d cutout artstyle really captures that replayable aspect well
one of my favorite games with a lot of potential if the modding scene sticks around
very nice procedural roguelike type game with good multiplayer support

still figuring stuff out but a pretty fun dd style game updated getting into the story like how its not rushed  youre actually playing with children of your characters pretty nice casual turnbased dd so far
super unique ff tactics like game love it
fast paced rougelike strategy adventure   all stories are told through interactive comics  you can customize a party of up to 6 characters with more in reserve
fantastic mix of story with choices and engaging turn based combat  love this game well worth the buy  excellent replayability
best tactical rpg ive played in years

honestly i cant stop playing this to me at least its like playing oldschool fire emblem games and with it being a rogue like it doesnt end when the story does at the point of this review i have 160 hours of game play and im nowhere near bored of the game
great game anyone else see the ball sack in the w

i love the storytelling in this game the characters very quickly feel like they have real personalities even though they are randomly generated the game play is easy to get the basics of but has lots of room for interesting tactics both overland and in combat
amazing game  i really had a fun time playing it
seems like an endless variety of storyparts which draw very well from the choices youve made looks like itll be replayable even after ive finished all the main stories
awesome
i love turn based games and this hits the mark
very nice

this is an amazing game that has depth but is also cozy it can be a good game to just chill and play at the default difficulties and it can be involved and tactical at the higher difficulties give it a try
good time waster
slick
this game is so much fun a lot to discover the relationships and families so cool and replayable
delightful procedural narrative like nothing ive seen elsewhere great vibes and a pretty novel approach to environmental combat effects

the community and their mods really let the game shine its nice to watch someones life unfold before your eyes as you take on evil the romance and friendships are a nice touch one bad thing is that it can be a bit monotonous if youre trying to do a whole campaign at once things start to blend together and sometimes its a lot of reading without actually being invested in the event  overall the game is unique and enjoyable if you like fantasy this game is a good investment
spectacular
if you like dd you will like this game
fun

this game this game is genuinely so amazing from the amazing and unique art style to the exciting and strategic combat to the personal growth and attachment you get the the characters this game has it all if you are a huge fan of diving into a world and losing yourself and growing a real personal attachment to the dynamic narratives that you get to decide btw then this game is for you
one of the best game i played in years excellent story telling good balancing many variety

wonderful alternative to d  d tabletop and variants for those who dont want to bother too much with mechanics and extensive dice roll but rather enjoy the fun of questing and role playing the procedural generated contend adds immense replayability more important  it has multiplayer  you can enjoy it in a party of five friends

the visual aspect of the game had me skeptic at he beginning but soon after starting to play it became part of its charm and originality excellent turnbase strategy game with nice characters and story recommended
i have played too much

i have been gaming for over 20 years and its been almost 20 years since a game has ever made me feel like this one has i wont spoil anything for you this game is not just for fantasy heads its for dreamers this game is the one
its wild how this game will unexpectedly pull you in for hours with every story feeling like a little myth you made yourself
great gameplay and writing with lovely artwork

dont let the graphics fool you this is a crpg with surprisingly deep tabletop elements and mechanics the roguelike element makes for rewarding additional playthroughs and there is a unique element of characters aging having kids and even returning in surprising ways in future adventures

im so glad that i stumbled across this after seeing a youtube video citing the best turnbased games dont let the cute graphics style deceive you as its a great game with depth and wears its heart on its sleeve
i actually cried
this game is wonderful if you like rpgs at all you owe it to yourself to try it out
who doesnt love a good story
lots of variety in the story telling and choices feel like they matter throughout each campaign great game for the steam deck gameplay is straightforward but addicting
a game i regularly come back to even after long breaks while it can get a little repetitive i find a lot of joy in going back and picking up old characters to try them out in new stories and dynamics
absolute peak gameplay
fantastic immersive and compelling hard mode really makes it tense and super fun
a lot of fun

a really fun game that balances strategy humor and characters very well the game truly feels like you have built your own dd session and you are both general and watching your characters grow and thrive
amazing and unique

this game is revolutionary and whoever doesnt see this or appreciate it is not a true game enjoyer much less a true game designer this is a masterpiece that sets the bar for how well player agency and worldbuilding should merge those procedural events are insanely random and fun to play and really well writtenprogrammed   you must play this game
i have become absurdly attached to some of my retired heroes
this game is like the embodiment of emergent narrative

this is a great game on its own and a fantastic game with friends im always shocked how emotive the game manages to make the simple faces look my friends and i always give our characters voices and act out the scenes lot of fun and good for a laugh
i love this game
fun like a lightweight version of divinity

if this game sounds cool to you youd probably like it written suprisingly well and flows better than you would expect from a procedural story theres also a lot of content to look into besides the random stuff i do wish there was some more depth to the combat especially precombat prep but thats because xcom set my standards too high

this game is beautiful and emotional and so so fun the soundtrack and writing are incredible like playing poetry with a symphony its moving and heartfelt and sad and sweet and emotional and beautiful and not like any game ive played some events appearances and combat abilities get repetitive but thats easily fixed with one of the many amazing mods out there highly highly recommend
i will miss you dearly amlor rattlefield
